price: Est-ce qu’ils n’ont pas réfléchi? Il n’y a point de folie en leur compagnon (Mohammed): il n’est qu’un avertisseur explicite!
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُواْۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yatafakkarū mā biṣāḥibihim min jinnatin in huwa illā nadhīrun mubīnun
